title: Opinion: My continuous glucose monitor graphs my life — but misses the big picture
description: “Diabetes is not only metabolic; it's emotional, cognitive, and situational,” writes Mark E. Paull.
content: “Diabetes is not only metabolic; it's emotional, cognitive, and situational,” writes Mark E. Paull.
